rules_text:
Your life total becomes 20.
Coalesce {8}{W}{W}{W}{W} [i](You may cast this from your graveyard for {8}{W}{W}{W}{W}. If you do, it enters as a Horror creature after it resolves. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield or not resolve.)[/i]
Born Anew’s power and toughness are each equal to your life total.
